ygData.subject: Re: Hello I am new
ygData.msgSnippet: Enjoy each level. Take your time leveling and enjoy each new zone you discover. Find your own playing style and work with that in mind. Get to know the many
ygData.messageBody:
Enjoy each level. Take your time leveling and enjoy each new zone you
discover. Find your own playing style and work with that in mind. Get
to know the many help sites so that you can learn about items,
quests, and interesting places to visit. Try the trade skills, see if
you enjoy that part of the game. Be polite. Help people. Have fun.

I have printed a map book I use when exploring. Keep the maps in a
binder I can lay before me when I play. I included zone connection
maps and a level chart. Information is important in this game.

Have fun.

Barto Proudfoot

--- In EverQuest@y..., "muaddib_1974" <muaddib1974@s...> wrote:
> Hello,
> How is everyone today? I am new to this club and to EverQuest. I
am
> trying to learn things about EverQuest. Anythnig you can tell me
will
> help. How can you scream, etc.... My name is David, I am 27, live
in
> Oklahoma.
> David
